title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
give you the following dialogue options.

Why didn't you mention the ring before this potion debacle? I have gold. Will that suit? No, I want this power. Keep your ring. How about I tell you more about the nautiloid? Every last detail. [INTIMIDATE] Either give me the ring, or I'll run you through. [BARD][PERFORMANCE] Perform the tale of your adventures so far: 'The Ballad of Brains, Brine Pools and Balderdash.' Leave.

Option 2 will open a trading menu where the ring can be bought for 175 gold.
